response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its unique features and the satisfaction it can bring, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience our product at a slightly higher value than its regular market price. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier offering. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 180}
